entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, trying to keep his voice calm while asking Hagrid about Fluffy.

entities.name: fluffy
entities.description: A three-headed dog that is a challenge for students at Hogwarts, described as a piece of cake if you know how to calm him down.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who seems to have a close relationship with Fluffy and is initially hesitant to share information about the dog.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who doesn't speak to each other until they come to a halt in the Entrance Hall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who doesn't speak to each other until they come to a halt in the Entrance Hall.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, whom Harry and his friends need to convince about the stranger under the cloak.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who is suspected by Harry and his friends to be the one under the cloak.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, whom Harry and his friends suspect to be under the cloak.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: A centaur who is a teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as someone who might back up Harry and his friends if Bane doesn't stop him.

entities.name: bane
entities.description: A centaur's horse, which is mentioned as a potential threat to Firenze.

relationships.description: Hagrid seems to have a close relationship with Fluffy and knows how to calm him down.
Harry needs to convince Dumbledore about the stranger under the cloak.
Snape is suspected by Harry and his friends to be the one under the cloak, which is actually Voldemort.
